sub_topic: Determining the equilibrium constant for a reaction involving a weak oxidizing or reducing agent.
message_1:
What is the equilibrium constant (Kc) of the reaction between a weak oxidizing agent such as Fe3+ and a reducing agent such as iodide (I-) ions in the following reaction and what does this value suggest about the position of equilibrium for the reaction?

Fe3+(aq) + I-(aq) â‡‹ Fe2+(aq) + I2(aq) 

You have been given concentrations of the reactants and products at equilibrium.
message_2: To calculate the equilibrium constant (Kc) for the given reaction, I will need the concentrations of the reactants and products at equilibrium. Please provide the equilibrium concentrations of Fe3+, I-, Fe2+, and I2.
